dia.en: The phone has no dial tone.
I need to decide who to call.
It looks like something plugs into it.
I need to plug something into it.
It looks like something plugs into it.
I need to plug something into it.
Hello. You have reached Future Tech: Cyborgs are the future.
I am afraid we are unable to take your call at the moment, please leave a message after the tone.
I know you are there, I just saw you in reception.
Thank your for you message, goodbye.
I'm sorry, I'm not available at the moment. If you leave a message, I will get back to you.<beep>
I guess I'll try another time.
Hi Jen here, you know what to do.<beep>
I guess I'll try another time.
This is the voice mail of 555-4772. You can leave a message after the tone.<beep>
I guess I'll try another time.
Hang on. Yeah, it's another..it's another person from that stupid adventure game that I never should have agreed to.
Yep, this is THE Jonathan Coulton. Er, but I...I can't talk right now, because I have to...write a song. Bye.
I don't believe it was really him.
The phone has no dial tone.
The phone has no dial tone.

title.en: There is something up with my computer.

dia.en: There is something up with my computer.

title.en: Could you come to my office please?

dia.en: Could you come to my office please?
I hear you have some fancy pants.

title.en: Could you come to my office please?

dia.en: Could you come to my office please?
Sorry, unless you have a specific problem we are unable to leave the office.

title.en: I think someone has been stealing from the medical cabinet.

dia.en: I think someone has been stealing from the medical cabinet.
Ok, I'll get someone to investigate.

title.en: I think I hear someone trying to break in!

dia.en: I think I hear someone trying to break in!
Ok, we'll keep a close eye on the security cameras.

title.en: Do you guys actually do anything?

dia.en: Do you guys actually do anything?
Of course, if it wasn't for us this place would be overrun with...errr
People with other people's ID cards and people using photos to fool the iris scanners?

title.en: Don't you want to know what my problem is first?

dia.en: Don't you want to know what my problem is first?
Hmm. Fine, what is the problem?

title.en: I don't see how this is relevant to my problem?

dia.en: I don't see how this is relevant to my problem?
Hmm. Fine, what is the problem?

title.en: You're not making fun of me with the weet code are you?

dia.en: You're not making fun of me with the weet code are you?
I would never do such a thing. I'm a professional.
Ok, Dr Martin. I've reset the password to a random new one. Change it when you login.

title.en: Don't you want to know what my problem is first?

dia.en: Don't you want to know what my problem is first?
Ok email it to me and I'll deal with it when I have some time. Probably late next month.
I can't access my email, that is part of the problem!

title.en: I appear to have Jonathan Coulton's phone number.

dia.en: I appear to have Jonathan Coulton's phone number.
Very funny. Why would you have that?
Ok, Dr Martin. I've reset the password to a random new one. Change it when you login.

title.en: I appear to have Jonathan Coulton's phone number.

dia.en: I appear to have Jonathan Coulton's phone number.
Very funny. Why would you have that?
That is a good question. Alas I have lost my memory, so I don't know.

title.en: Don't suppose you know any pirate jokes?

dia.en: Don't suppose you know any pirate jokes?
I do, What does a robot pirate drink?
Oh yeah, I know that one! Thanks.
Have you tried turning it off and on again?

title.en: I think someone is trying to silence me!

dia.en: I think someone is trying to silence me!
Sorry, I need to mute you for a minute.

title.en: I woke up in a locked room.

dia.en: I woke up in a locked room.
I knew Mr Goody Two-Shoes would get arrested. It's always the quiet ones.
Great, you owe me loads of money.
I wonder the same thing all the time.
It was good to speak Ted. Later.
Meet me at the coffee shop in town in half an hour.
Ok. I remember that at least.

title.en: I can't deal with this right now. Good bye!

dia.en: I can't deal with this right now. Good bye!

title.en: I don't know who I am!

dia.en: I don't know who I am!
Wow, she must be getting desperate!

title.en: I woke up in a locked room!

dia.en: I woke up in a locked room!
Blimey! She must be in serious trouble.

title.en: I think someone is trying to silence me!

dia.en: I think someone is trying to silence me!
Ted Martin! That is a strange question. You ok Ted?
Tom! That is a strange question. You ok Ted?
Meet me at the coffee shop in town.
Ok. I remember that at least.

title.en: I can't deal with this right now. Good bye!

dia.en: I can't deal with this right now. Good bye!

title.en: I don't know where the coffee shop is.

dia.en: I don't know where the coffee shop is.
It's in the south west of the town.
I'm at the coffee shop waiting.
I'm still at the coffee shop if you want to speak again.
No, you just need something to enable it
You need to find it. Have you checked the drawers.

title.en: How do I convince the guard to come?

dia.en: How do I convince the guard to come?
Have you tried listening to what they are talking about in their office

title.en: I can't hear through the door

dia.en: I can't hear through the door
You need to enhance your hearing

title.en: Just tell me what to do!

dia.en: Just tell me what to do!
Pick up the stethoscope and use it on the security office door in the hall
It is the IT guy, but you'll need to make him like you first

title.en: How do I make the IT guy like me?

dia.en: How do I make the IT guy like me?
I bet he'd love you if you gave him the number of his idol!
Or maybe just knowing his name would be enough

title.en: How do I get his idols phone number?

dia.en: How do I get his idols phone number?
I hear that you had it before you lost your memory

title.en: How do I find out his name?

dia.en: How do I find out his name?
I bet that is shown somewhere in the building?

title.en: Just tell me how to get the phone number

dia.en: Just tell me how to get the phone number
It's on a piece of paper used as a bookmark in a book
The book is in the bed side cabinet in your bed room
Find the book, get the book mark, look at it, and phone the number to find out who it is.

title.en: Just tell me how to find out his name.

dia.en: Just tell me how to find out his name.
Look at all the photos in the hall
One of them is of him, and they all have names on them

title.en: The guard refuses to come to the office

dia.en: The guard refuses to come to the office
Maybe you need to know more about them

title.en: Do I need to phone anyone?

dia.en: Do I need to phone anyone?

title.en: Are there any pirate jokes to be found?

dia.en: Are there any pirate jokes to be found?
